text: Afrim Bilali (born 8 September 1979) is an Albanian professional basketball player who played for Kamza Basket in the Albanian Basketball League. He was a member of the Albania national basketball team between 2002 and 2012 and he is the current assistant coach of the national team.FIBA Europe profile ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Albanian men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Shkodër Category:Guards (basketball)
title: Afrim Bilali
